archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Open Registers
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
A Nextcloud-based app for managing structured, authoritative datasets (registers). It ensures versioned, trusted, and structured data storage, accessible via API and UI.
Key Features: - Store and manage registers in JSON, CSV, or XML format. - Version control and access permissions. - WebDAV & API integration for external system access. - Federation support for syncing across Nextcloud instances.
